questions.question: Choose the right options to fill the gaps: "I usually _____ to work, but these days I _________ my bike".

choices.answer: drive / am riding
am driving / ride
am driving / am riding
drive / ride

questions.question: Right (true) or wrong (false): "My kid is knowing all the characters from Mario video games".

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: Have you read Harry Potter yet?

choices.answer: Yes, I've already read it twice.
Yes, I've just read it two years ago.
Yes, I've read everything yet.
Yes, I've read it already.
He's gone to Australia for two years.
He's been to Australia for two years.
He went to Australia two years ago.
He'll go to Australia in two years.

questions.question: Have you ever eaten Italian food in Italy?

choices.answer: Yes, I ate spaghetti last year in Rome.
Yes, I've eaten spaghetti last year in Rome.
Yes, I eat spaghetti last year in Rome.
Yes, I'm going to eat spaghetti last year in Rome.
